name: Phone (Mikyle Fourie)
description:
This is a "game" where you, an average teenager, comes across a peculiar and powerful cellphone... It quickly becomes apparent that there is some being speaking through the phone, coercing you to act in certain ways.   

This game was made in just two days by a group of three in Twine as part of the Global Game Jam. The developers were unexperienced with Twine and thus did not have enough time to develop any "game"-like mechanics. Regardless, we are proud of what we created and hope to develop it further in future !
